General.Name: Jinglv Envi Science & Tech Co
General.Description: Jinglv Environment Science and Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells sanitation equipment. It offers cleaning; household garbage collection, sorting, and transfer services; toilet renovation management and protection; and agricultural environmental management solutions, such as village sewage treatment. The company also provides sanitation investment operation management services through franchising model to provide customers with services comprising toilet management and maintenance. In addition, the company offers sanitation vehicles, garbage compression equipment, rural sewage treatment equipment, deep-buried trash cans, toilet products, etc. Jinglv Environment Science and Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Hefei, China.
